snippet: The Japanese horse A Shin Hikari swept to victory and a prize of about $1.84 million at the Hong Kong International Races, one of the world’s richest events.
abstract: Japanese horse A Shin Hikari wins Hong Kong International Races.
lead_paragraph: The Japanese horse A Shin Hikari swept to victory and a prize of about $1.84 million at the Hong Kong International Races, one of the world’s richest events.

headline.main: A $1.84 Million Victory in Hong Kong
headline.print_headline: A $1.84 Million Victory in Hong Kong
